"Story Chapter 6":
"After completing the Main Task \"Fabricated World\", the main story will move on to Chapter 6.

After moving on to Chapter 6, Side Tasks relating to side stories from Chapters 1-5 will be marked as completed, and unviewed Short Episodes will be marked as viewed."

"Uncleared Story Quests and unviewed Short Episodes can be accessed from the Quest Counter.

You can obtain rewards for uncleared Story Quests by accepting them from the Quest Counter and clearing them."
